LanguageData.HaulingUrgent.label: Transporte+
LanguageData.HaulingUrgent.description: High-priority hauling. Works like the regular kind, but only for things that are manually designated. Use Architect > Orders > Haul Urgently to designate things to haul.\nAdded by the Allow Tool mod. Can be disabled in Options > Mod Settings.
LanguageData.FinishingOff.label: Finalizar
LanguageData.FinishingOff.description: Rápidamente y sin dolor, matar a las criaturas derribadas.\nAdicionado por la herramienta Permitir mod. Se puede inhabilitar en Opciones > Configuración de Mod.
